alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Colleton (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 3:28PM EDT until June 09 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT AND COLLETON COUNTIES... At 326 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bennetts Point to Ladys Island, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 325 PM, the Beaufort County Warning Point indicated this line of storms is producing wind damage with numerous trees being reported down across parts of the county. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Beaufort, Edisto Beach and Ladys Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
